sentences.sentence: Purchasing government bonds, they argue, is tantamount to monetising government deficits.
sentences.translation: 他们相信购买国家债券等同于兑现国家赤字。

sentences.sentence: Sina had planned to start monetising the service, but has instead decided to wait until the second half of the year.
sentences.translation: 新浪计划开始对此项服务收费，但是决定等到今年下半年。
